attributes.action: RESIDENTS IN WEDNESBURY WANT TO SEE MORE POLICE AND SUPPORT ON OUR STREETS.
attributes.additional_details: If you look at the level in crime levels in this area you will notice the increase within our town. Please help our town and community.
attributes.background: The level of crime has increased in the town of Wednesbury, the main problem is drug issues which is causing an increase in burglary and criminal damage in our town. We as a town believe we require more police presence as we don’t seem to be given the amount of presence we require.

rejection.details:
Policing in your local area is the responsibility of your local police force and your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC).

You can find out how to contact your PCC here:

https://lincolnshire-pcc.gov.uk/
